recipesJson.name: CHEEKY Cherry Limeade
recipesJson.author: MECH_MOD_RN
recipesJson.description:
A sweet and slightly tart cherry forward mix with a lime finish 
mixed for  Mixing with my  mates 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M0OJ5MT0H2E

**RED CHERRY** is a fantastic sweet fleshy and slightly candied cherry that works in this profile and helps with the cherry flesh here 
**TART CHERRY** is a bight tart and thin cherry that works in a beverage mix .
**LIME TAHITY** for me is the juice of a lime not too bitter or overly candy which is what I want with this
**LEMON LIME SODA** works as the sprite type base soda for this 
**JELLY CANDY** adds that syrup mouth feel this mix needs 
SWEETENER: I rarely add super sweet to anything - but this is a very sweet beverage with tartness so it just calls for super sweet with the fruits

Learn more about mixing here:
facebook - https://www.facebook.com/groups/diydownunder/
Discord - https://discord.gg/kH4Fqbc
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTCwb7ULyfJALQlehomZZQA
website - https://www.diydownunder.com/
